name: They Fear Light
description:
Since some people said that the game is too difficult, I've also added an easier version as a separate download

Entry for Mini Jam 83! 

WSAD / arrow keys - movement

LMB - shoot

RMB - use flashlight

Space - roll the dice

P - pause menu

TOOLS AND RESOURCES USED

Engine - Unity 2021.1.0f1

Art - Aseprite

Sound effects - microphone + audacity, freesound.org
